emailMessageTemplate.subject: Buying Catalogue password reset
emailMessageTemplate.htmlContent:
You requested a password reset for your Buying Catalogue account.

Please use this link to reset your password.

The link can be used only once and will be valid for 24 hours from the time you received this email.

Your new password must be at least ten characters in length and match on confirmation.

It must contain at least 3 of the following 4 character types:

lower case letters (a-z)
upper case letters (A-Z)
numbers (0-9)
special characters (e.g. !@#$%^&*)

Yours sincerely,
The Buying Catalogue team

emailMessage.subject: Set password for Buying Catalogue
emailMessage.htmlContent:
Thank you for requesting a user account for the Buying Catalogue.

Your account has now been created and you can now set your password.

Your password must be at least ten characters in length and match on confirmation.

It must contain at least 3 of the following 4 character types:

lower case letters (a-z)
upper case letters (A-Z)
numbers (0-9)
special characters (e.g. !@#$%^&*)

The link can be used only once to set up one account, and will be valid for 24 hours from the time you received this email.

Help us improve the Buying Catalogue

We would really like your help in shaping and influencing the development of the Buying Catalogue. You can support us in two ways:

  • By participating in user research. If you'd like to work with us on our research, please email buying.catalogue@nhs.net. Once we receive your email, we'll invite you to join our user research sessions where we'll show new features and get your feedback on them.
  • By providing feedback to us on your experience of using the Buying Catalogue. We have a Buying Catalogue user survey that you can access directly.

Yours sincerely,

The Buying Catalogue team
